title: User
description: A user is a registrated person or client interacting with the VPDB API.

email.description: The email address of the user

email_status.title: Email Status
email_status.description: Status of the email address (see below).

code.description:
Status code of the email. The following are valid values:
 * `confirmed` - Email address is confirmed.
 * `pending_registration` - Email address is to be confirmed after registration.
 * `pending_update` - Email address is to be confirmed after profile update.

expires_at.description: Timestamp when the token sent by email expires. Only set if code not equals `confirmed`.

value.description: The new email address that is about to be confirmed. Only set if code not equals `confirmed`.

username.description: Username used when locally logging in.

name.description: Display name, initially set to user name.

provider.description: How the user is authenticated. For local accounts this is set to `local`, otherwise to the name of the OAuth2 provider.

roles.description: List of roles the user belongs to.

is_active.description: Whether the user is able to login. Set to `false` to ban a user.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created.

permissions.description: Set of permissions for that user, see [permission](/api/permissions).
